segments.text: Hey Michael . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No where special . I was just taking a walk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To get a little exercise . I'm so out of shape .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , I play basketball with a bunch of friends twice a week . It's great exercise and it's fun too . Why don't you come out and play with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . Give me a call next time you guys play .
segments.speaker: S2
